text:
<@U03C6TEAZ> wikigo にバグを見つけた気がするので、issue っときました
<https://github.com/mattn/wikigo/issues/1>

attachments.text: page content # hi ## foo - a - b - c ## bar 1. a 1. b 1. c go.mod module <http://github.com/mattn/wikigo|github.com/mattn/wikigo> go 1.12 require ( <http://github.com/dgrijalva/jwt-go|github.com/dgrijalva/jwt-go> v3.2.0+incompatible // indirect <http://github.com/jinzhu/gorm|github.com/jinzhu/gorm>...

text: efm-langserver 改良の時間がとれねぇ
うおー。config についての意見も何か言おうと思ってて完全に忘れていた

attachments.fallback:
[July 10th, 2019 5:51 AM] mattn: 現状
```
languages:
  eruby:
    lint-command: 'erb -x -T - | ruby -c'
    lint-stdin: true
    lint-offset: 1
    format-command: 'htmlbeautifier'

  vim:
    lint-command: 'vint -'
    lint-stdin: true

  markdown:
    lint-command: 'markdownlint -s'
    lint-stdin: true
    lint-formats:
      - '%f: %l: %m'
```
attachments.text:
現状
```
languages:
  eruby:
    lint-command: 'erb -x -T - | ruby -c'
    lint-stdin: true
    lint-offset: 1
    format-command: 'htmlbeautifier'

  vim:
    lint-command: 'vint -'
    lint-stdin: true

  markdown:
    lint-command: 'markdownlint -s'
    lint-stdin: true
    lint-formats:
      - '%f: %l: %m'
```
